Grammar:    DataElement 4.0
Namespace:  shr.test

EntryElement: CardConstraintOnValueChild
Description:  "It is an entry with a card constraint on the value's child"
Value:        Simple
1..2          Simple.string

EntryElement: CardConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:  "It is a group entry with a card constraint on a field's child"
0..1    Simple
0..1    Simple2
1..2    Simple2.string

Element:        Simple
Value:          1..* string

Element:        Simple2
Value:          1..* string
